About Me

Let me give you a few tidbits...

BIO

First, let me start out by saying thank you for taking the time to view my portfolio. I am so excited to be a part of this amazing industry that is Web Development.

Software Developer

As a Software Developer, my skills include HTML, CSS, Less, Sass, JavaScript, Git, React.js, Python, Formik, GraphQL, Prisma, Apollo, Node.js, Express, Axios, Restful APIs, SQLite3, PostGres, mock, unit, and integration testing using React-Testing-Library and Jest, Big O Notation & Data Structures.

Designer

As a Designer, I enhanced the capability and design of web pages by creating features such as headers, footers, contact forms, blog pages, and tables using Adobe Photoshop and WordPress Page Builders which include Elementor and Divi.

Entrepreneur

As an Entrepreneur, I have a BS degree in Accounting and extensive knowledge of building a business and maintaining it. Aside from that, I have over 20 years of client/service experience.
